const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  mappings: {
    dynamic_templates: [
      {
        longs_as_strings: {
          match_mapping_type: "string",
          match: "long_*",
          unmatch: "*_text",
          mapping: {
            type: "long",
          },
        },
      },
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    long_num: "5",
    long_text: "foo",
  },
});
console.log(response1);
